main.docTitle: Exemption from Profits Tax (Non-Renminbi Sovereign Bonds) Order

def.name: NonRenminbiSovereignBonds
def.leadIn: non-Renminbi sovereign bonds (非人民幣國債) means bonds—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: denominated in any currency other than the Renminbi; and

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: issued in Hong Kong by the Central People’s Government.

subsection.leadIn: A person is exempt from the payment of profits tax chargeable under Part 4 of the Ordinance in respect of sums received by, or accrued to, the person as—

paragraph.name: a
paragraph.content: interest paid or payable on non-Renminbi sovereign bonds;

paragraph.name: b
paragraph.content: profits on the sale, or other disposal, of non-Renminbi sovereign bonds; or

paragraph.name: c
paragraph.content: profits on the redemption, on maturity or presentment, of non-Renminbi sovereign bonds.

subsection.content: This section applies in relation to profits tax chargeable for the year of assessment commencing on 1 April 2017 and for all subsequent years of assessment.
